name: django-erp
body: The project showcases the use of Django framework to create modular applications. It is a very simple ERP system with 3 modules: HR, Sales and Finance. The HR module handles job offers, application, employees and their salaries. The Sales module stores the information about clients and products sold to them. Finally, the Finance modules aggregates the above information to depict the incomes and outcomes on a graph. --- The project was created by Szymon Przedwojski and Tomasz Åšcibiorek in the scope of a university project at the Lodz University of Technology (Poland).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
